tags: None
review:
Most of the doctors get impatient and dictative as they  move up in their career but that is not the case with Dr.Sunitha. We go to a doctor when in pain or in desperate need of medical help *** ****** ******* **** ** ******* **** she understands the severity of the issue pretty quickly, cares for her patients, takes extra care to make her patients comfortable, gives confidence in the procedures and does the right things... 

You meet Dr.Sunitha once and I am sure you will agree with all my observations mentioned above. 

Since 2010, I have referred many of my friends/relatives and they have been really happy with Dr.Sunitha's treatment.

I would say "Meet her once"... YOU WILL DEFINITELY GET THE RIGHT DIRECTION AND MEDICAL HELP.

Thanks Doctor Sunitha for giving us the right medical support and bringing back SMILE in our lives !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Before saying a few words, first I would like to thank the doctors of milann hospital who are well experienced, friendly and cooperative. I am really very happy to take treatment from dr sunitha ma'am. She is very soft, kind hearted, and very friendly in nature. She gives good guidance to the patients. One thing I liked about ma'am is watever may be the result in the report, she doesn't make the patient to panic. She says DON'T WORRY EVERYTHING IS NORMAL. We feel very much relaxed after hearing that. She gives the correct treatment for that. Always she will be smiling. Keep smiling ma'am. Thank u so much ma'am for ur great concern towards ur patients. I highly recommend sunitha ma'am. Once again thank u  ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Really I am so happy with millan hospital .. because I was entered like a single person in hospital because of fertility problem but bavani mam and all staff supported me a lot lot...they gave **** treatment now I am 2 months pregnant  by natural after laproscopy .... really I want to lot of thanks to millan... really I will not forget to end of ma life.....I suggest all of them who suffering from infertility ... please go and contact bavani mam or sunitha mam ......****** ** *** **** ******** ** ********* **..I love you so much and lottttt .....millan

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sunitha was referred by a friend to me and Dr Sunitha was really calm and composed understood the issue and provided the medicines and treatment to heal internally. I had met 2 doctors and spent 3 months suffering, after meeting this doctor in 2 weeks I was fit and fine. She is an angel sent from above. My stitches had not healed completely and I was asked to get the re stitches done and i met this doctor and it was a miracle! she prescribed tablets and in a week I was fine. Nature heals, medicine laughs is what is what she believes in and said to me. Thank you! Dr Sunitha.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am satisfied with the treatment and consultation provided by Dr. Sunitha at Milann Hospital.
She is very friendly with the patients, listens to problem very carefully, and prescribes the medicines only if it is required. Above all, she will not only treat the patient physically but mentally too. 
I have taken pre-natal consultation from her till 8.5 months. My only regret will be that I have taken decision to deliver my first child in my home town. After the delivery, my stitches were not healed till 3 months. I visited her again for post natal checkup, and with her advice and treatment, I was able to resume back to my normal life. 
Thank you so much Mam!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** ** *** **** ****** *** *** *** **** ********** I don‚Äôt have words to describe, she handled my wife‚Äôs pregnancy very well explaining all issues and procedures, tests, she treated in such a way that mom and babies are safe and delivered in correct time, she took special care and handled it in the best way

I recommend this doctor for all expecting mothers and all pre and post pregnancy issues

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
We had to wait for over 3 hours. Dr read notes from her assistant and did not spend more than 3 minutes! 
We felt she was preoccupied with something else. Read the reviews and scheduled an appointment. However,walked out feeling we could have used our time and money consulting a better doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor is good but the waiting time is bad. I have booked appointment from practo and have realized that reaching there on time with an appointment doesn't mean anything. I am still made to wait for hours so I don't get th logic of why appointments must be taken if we don't get to meet the doc on time. It also happened that the staff forgot to block time in practo when doc was not der and I simply ended up at the hospital adjusting my schedule and I cudnt meet the doc on the right day. Its high time someone looks into this including practo on what is the value add of appointments which don't mean anything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Sunitha is not an empathetic person. She would just tell you what she wants to, but will never ask the patient how they feel. She insisted a lot in opting for delivery package on my every visit, which i really did not like. In this particular visit, she had asked me to opt for a research on stretch marks cream, which i refused. She specifically called me after i reached home and asked me to opt for it again. I denied it and then she had no option but to say OK. *** ***** ** ** ******** ******* *** ******* ****** **** *** ******* ** ********* I do not advice to see her.
